external_references.description: Venere, G. Neal, C. (2022, June 21). Avos ransomware group expands with new attack arsenal. Retrieved January 11, 2023.

description: During [C0018](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0018), [AvosLocker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1053) was disguised using the victim company name as the filename.(Citation: Cisco Talos Avos Jun 2022)
